Question
========
Why might you ask an AI tool to write analysis code instead of doing the analysis directly?

Answerlist
----------
* It avoids the need to run the code yourself
* It ensures the AI output is always correct
* It lets you run, review, and modify the analysis locally for reproducibility
* It guarantees the AI will use the latest packages

Solution
========
Having the AI generate code allows you to review, run, and adapt it locally.

Answerlist
----------
* False
* False
* True
* False
